name: Groupie
description: Moves selected layers relative to the parent group.
author: Aparajita Fishman

commands.name: Center Horizontally in Parent
commands.description: Center selected layers horizontally in the parent container

commands.name: Center Vertically in Parent
commands.description: Center selected layers vertically in the parent container

commands.name: Center in Parent
commands.description: Center selected layers horizontally and vertically in the parent container

commands.name: Align to Left of Parent
commands.description: Align selected layers to left edge of the parent container

commands.name: Align to Right of Parent
commands.description: Align selected layers to right edge of the parent container

commands.name: Align to Top of Parent
commands.description: Align selected layers to top edge of the parent container

commands.name: Align to Bottom of Parent
commands.description: Align selected layers to bottom edge of the parent container
